subject: Gardening
title: Kew Gardens: Science Meets Beauty
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Kew Gardens: Science Meets Beauty.

hook.text: Kew Gardens houses over 50,000 living plants and holds the world's largest collection of living orchids.
